content.query:
-- type your sql script here, we now have intellisense
COPY INTO [Kiabi].[Sales]
(day_id 1, style_id 2, color_id 3, size_id 4, store_id 5, sales_channel_id 6, sales_unitlong 7, currency_id 8, sales_revenue 9, sales_revenue_vat 10, sales_cost 11, sales_markdowns_pos 12, returns_unit 13, returns_retail 14, returns_cost 15, type_evenement 16, date_integration 17, date_evenement 18)
FROM 'https://datalakekiabi1.dfs.core.windows.net/poc/prd/data/public/stocks/predictix/sales/sales/'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,COMPRESSION = 'snappy'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [Kiabi].[Sales]
GO
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM [Kiabi].[Sales]
